Humans with wings could soar through the skies and explore new heights and perspectives, potentially leading to a deeper understanding and appreciation of nature.
With wings, humans could travel faster and more efficiently, reducing travel time and carbon emissions, making the world more connected and sustainable.
Humans with wings could potentially be able to lift and carry heavy objects, making tasks such as construction and transportation easier and more efficient.
The addition of wings could enable humans to perform stunts and feats of agility, leading to new forms of entertainment and athletic achievement.

Humans with wings could to birds and other animals, potentially leading to a greater understanding and empathy for other species, as well as new ways of communicating and interacting with the natural world.
